articles.description: The New England Patriots coach understands what his attendance at a White House ceremony would have meant in this climate and context.
articles.content: Coaches always go to the tape. And the tape, that hideous tape, does not lie. Had Belichick stood by his acceptance, he would have risked handing a propaganda victory to militia terrorists, white sup… [+6514 chars]

articles.description: AS HEARD ON WBAL RADIO: See what it looked like from the play-by-play booth as Gerry Sandusky and Femi Ayanbadejo called the Baltimore Ravens Marcus Peters i...
